<li class="provider-list-item" id="provider-575206" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/ListItem">
  

































    
        
        
    







    






    

    

    

    

    



<meta itemprop="position" content="4">

<div
    class="provider provider-row sg-show-more-less__container sg-show-more-less__container--collapsed provider-row--non-ppc sponsor "
    data-is-list="true"
    data-clutch-pid="575206"
    data-title="Futured"

            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praised Futured for their accommodating nature and willingness to meet project needs. One client noted that the team was &#34;as helpful and accommodating as possible&#34; and even worked overtime to meet deadlines, despite some delays. Another client highlighted their &#34;super adaptability&#34; and effective communication, which facilitated a seamless collaboration. Overall, clients expressed a positive sentiment towards Futured&#39;s flexibility and support throughout the project lifecycle.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="575206"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="258622"
          data-gtm_insight_id="896187"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev & UI/UX Design for Licensing Authority</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 30, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The team tried to be as helpful and <b>accommodating to our needs</b> as possible. They were willing to work overtime to best meet our deadlines. In the end, unfortunately, we were not able to avoid delays compared to the original timeline, the complexity of the application was higher than we expected on both sides at the beginning of the collaboration.
            </p>
          </div>

            >
                Accommodating
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding The NineHertz&#39;s accommodating nature is overwhelmingly positive. Clients highlighted their flexibility in scheduling, with one stating, &#34;They accommodated our schedule... it was never an inconvenience on our end.&#34; Another noted their ability to swiftly implement changes despite project delays, emphasizing, &#34;They’ve been accommodating and they’ve quickly implemented anything I’ve requested.&#34; Overall, clients appreciated their responsiveness and commitment to meeting client needs, contributing to a favorable project experience.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_insight_id="753871"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Design & Dev for Social Networking Application</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently express high satisfaction with Designli&#39;s accommodating nature. One client highlighted their willingness to adjust to schedules, budgets, and ideas, stating, &#39;the Designli team is better at it than the other teams we’ve used in the past.&#39; Another client noted the collaborative process, emphasizing that Designli is &#39;quite accommodating to any new desires I bring to them.&#39; Overall, feedback indicates a strong sentiment of appreciation for Designli&#39;s flexibility and responsiveness.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback indicates a strong sentiment of collaboration with Developer Bazaar Technologies. One client highlighted the team&#39;s &#39;proactive communication and problem-solving skills,&#39; which ensured a smooth development process. Another noted their &#39;organized workflow&#39; and &#39;speedy collaboration,&#39; emphasizing their ability to address needs promptly. While there were minor suggestions for improvement in comprehension skills, the overall sentiment reflects a positive and productive partnership characterized by effective teamwork and clear communication.
      </p>
    </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Konstant Infosolutions has received consistently positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature. Clients highlighted instances of the team being flexible and responsive to project changes, such as one client noting their ability to adjust to requests without difficulty. Another client praised their willingness to work at a preferred pace, ensuring that the project aligned with their vision. Overall, clients appreciated the collaborative communication and the team&#39;s commitment to meeting their needs throughout the development process.
      </p>
    </div>

      </h4>

Another CEO highlighted their ease in adapting to various project requirements and maintaining constant coordination. The responsive communication, including regular updates and the ability to connect with leadership, further underscores their accommodating approach, fostering a collaborative and supportive project environment.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Sigma Software Group for their accommodating nature and flexibility. One client noted their readiness to adapt to project needs, stating that Sigma was &#34;accommodating and flexible&#34; in making adjustments during development. Another highlighted Sigma&#39;s commitment to integrating seamlessly with their processes, ensuring that customer requirements were met without complications. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Sigma&#39;s ability to align with client expectations and workflows.
      </p>
    </div>

              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 10, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The platform built by Sigma Software became live and revenue-generating within 6 months. There was a lot of feedback in that short period of time, with tweaks, upgrades, and changes to the development schedule. <b>Sigma Software was accommodating and flexible in doing this.</b> They worked with us in interpreting what we were trying to get done. Our main expertise was around the marketing for a software-as-a-service platform.

      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Tapptitude has received overwhelmingly positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature. Clients praised their flexibility and responsiveness, with specific instances highlighting their willingness to adapt to project specifications and timelines. One client noted that Tapptitude never refused a request, stating, &#39;They never let me down,&#39; while another remarked on their ability to understand and integrate client needs seamlessly. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Tapptitude&#39;s commitment to client satisfaction and their proactive approach to problem-solving.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="1400340"
              data-gtm_insight_id="1428707"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Collaborative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        LeanCode demonstrates a strong collaborative spirit, as highlighted by their willingness to engage in pre-development workshops, which provided clarity on team values and principles. Clients noted LeanCode&#39;s flexibility in team composition and their openness to experimenting with new approaches. One client emphasized that LeanCode not only understands technology but also business dynamics, sharing valuable insights and fostering a productive learning environment. Overall, the sentiment reflects a highly positive experience in collaboration and communication.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1400340"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="121827"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1428707"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Workplace Fitness SaaS Startup</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jun 25, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              At the beginning as a founder I was the part of the development team working as a full-time Product Owner and Manager. At the next stages we included our in-house junior PO and backend developer. <b>It was experimental but works really well as guys from LeaCode are also very open to test new approaches</b>. LeanCode taught us how to build great product effectively.
            </p>
          </div>

            >Steamclock Software is a specialized Mobile App Development company that excels in iOS and Android development, offering services that include custom software design, UI/UX development, and app maintenance. Reviews highlight their technical expertise, proactive communication, and commitment to project timelines. Approximately 95% of feedback is positive, with clients praising their innovative solutions and adaptability, while a small percentage noted slower turnaround times during high-demand periods.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The feedback regarding collaboration with Steamclock Software is overwhelmingly positive. Clients noted their impressive transparency and ability to ask pertinent questions, which fostered a collaborative environment. One CEO highlighted Steamclock&#39;s role as integral team members, emphasizing their exceptional iOS expertise and the collaborative decision-making process they maintained throughout projects. The client appreciated the ongoing communication about trade-offs in project options, demonstrating a strong partnership approach. Overall, the sentiment reflects high satisfaction with Steamclock&#39;s collaborative efforts.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          data-gtm_insight_id="725611"

              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 2, 2017</span>
            </div>

              They <b>worked in a collaborative and open way</b>. I was really impressed with the <b>transparency they had in approaching me</b>. They did a good job <b>asking a lot of questions</b> and they kept focused on the right goals.

Their services are consistently praised for professionalism, quick response times, and a seamless integration into client teams, with 100% of the reviews highlighting their effective communication and team collaboration. However, some clients noted budget concerns, although many returned due to the quality and trustworthiness of MindSea's work.

A CEO noted that MindSea &#39;treats us like a partner&#39; and is &#39;highly transparent,&#39; showcasing their commitment to client needs. Their ability to communicate openly and deliver on time further illustrates their accommodating sentiment. Overall, clients appreciate MindSea&#39;s dedication to the project and their willingness to support and collaborate effectively.
      </p>

                Collaborative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights STRV&#39;s strong collaborative nature, emphasizing their proactive approach to problem-solving and open communication. For instance, a senior director noted their team&#39;s resilience and solution-oriented mindset during a critical project setback. Multiple clients praised STRV&#39;s seamless integration into their teams, with one CEO remarking on their effective collaboration in weekly sprints. Overall, the sentiment is overwhelmingly positive, with clients appreciating STRV&#39;s commitment to partnership and adaptability in meeting project needs.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="46156"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="235074"
          data-gtm_insight_id="732001"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Development Services for Boutique Fitness Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Sep 22, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              In other words, they’re <b>highly collaborative even if the issue doesn’t come from their side</b>. They don’t worry about where it comes from — they simply stay solution-oriented around us and aim to hit our business goals rather than letting issues cause more issues. STRV has been highly transparent in terms of deadlines and budgets. We’ve been paying attention to that, and they’re <b>highly collaborative in that sense</b>. We’ve had some tight deadlines, but they’re honest with us about what’s realistic and what’s not. We <b>collaborate to find the best ways to meet our needs in the most effective manner</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/strv/235074"

            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="46156"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="205138"
          data-gtm_insight_id="732001"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Software Dev for Software Development Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 30, 2023</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The engineers and product and project managers joined our weekly sprints and daily meetings; STRV <b>worked as a part of our team</b>. The team worked remotely for the most part, but we met in person a few times. Their ease of integration was incredibly smooth, and they got up to speed quickly. STRV had strong communication skills, and they <b>collaborated effectively</b>. The team was professional and kept our needs in mind throughout the engagement.
            </p>
          </div>

            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              STRV was more of a strategic partner for us than just a contractor. They helped support our development shop in ways that I would never have expected and weren’t even part of their scope. STRV had more engineers than us, and they brought over best practices that we <b>worked together to implement</b>. When faced with a challenge, the team was very <b>solution-oriented and collaborative</b>. Working with STRV didn't feel transactional, which was a big part of their success and had a lot to do with what the CEO brought to the table.
            </p>
          </div>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="22955"
              data-gtm_insight_id="750032"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Accommodating
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently praise Droids On Roids for their accommodating nature and willingness to collaborate closely. One client noted their proactive approach, stating, &#34;They helped us book the team and start development right after the workshop.&#34; Another emphasized, &#34;They really want to see our vision come to life, and they’ve not only been accommodating but also encouraging.&#34; Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for the team&#39;s flexibility and commitment to aligning with client needs.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="22955"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="137057"
          data-gtm_insight_id="750032"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev & Workshop for Online Marketplace</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 28, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They work very fast and <b>accommodate us</b>. After the workshop phase, I wanted them to start on the development phase right after. They prebooked the developers while we were doing the workshop. Two months ago, they already knew which team members they would like to have. They were <b>very accommodating</b>. They helped us book the team and start development right after the workshop.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/droids-roids/137057"
            title="View Droids On Roids Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="22955"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="137057"
            data-gtm_insight_id="750032"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="22955"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="126371"
          data-gtm_insight_id="750032"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev for Health & Wellness Community Startup </h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">

              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 30, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They have been very cordial; if we ever want to have additional meetings, they have encouraged us to schedule those. We have taken that opportunity and scheduled meetings with specific team members, such as the graphic designer or someone working on the frontend. Their communication is very clear, and they are <b>very accommodating</b>. They are a very easy company to work with. I highly recommend them to anyone out there looking to develop an app.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Ackee has received positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature in project management. Clients highlighted their ability to swiftly adapt to changing project scopes and deliver effective solutions. For instance, one client noted that despite initial challenges, Ackee&#39;s team quickly realigned with their evolving needs, facilitating timely project completion. Another client praised the proactive approach of Ackee&#39;s UX developer, who engaged directly with drivers to understand their requirements better. Overall, clients expressed satisfaction with Ackee&#39;s flexibility and responsiveness throughout the collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="472170"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="9828"
          data-gtm_insight_id="877054"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Web & Mobile App Dev for Courier Service Provider</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 30, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Management style: open, strict on cooperation, scope, pushing us to deliver as well. But in case of problem (not realistic to meet deadline with given scope) <b>they were able to open the scope, time discussion</b> and while initially some team members were not happy to change course, <b>they were able to quickly realign with our changing needs</b> and accept a new direction without being difficult or trying to use this for some unfair price renegotiation.
            </p>

            >Devsinc is a software development company renowned for its expertise in Ruby on Rails and agile project management. Across reviews, 75% of clients commend their reliability and prompt response times, while 50% highlight their strong technical skills. A notable theme is their ability to align with client needs and deliver on time, although improvements in senior staffing and turnover were occasionally suggested.

                Great project management

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Great project management
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Devsinc for their exceptional project management capabilities. One CEO noted, &#39;They’ve been great from a project management standpoint,&#39; highlighting their effective use of Atlassian Jira and reliable communication via email and Slack. The ease of collaboration and commitment to project success have left clients feeling reassured, with one stating, &#39;You’re in very good hands because Agile17 is a great team.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with their project management approach.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

          data-gtm_provider_id="1755717"

          data-gtm_review_id="127618"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1514076"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Software Product Dev for HR Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 16, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They’ve been <b>great from a project management standpoint</b>, and I highly recommend them. We use Atlassian Jira to <b>manage the project</b>, and we typically communicate with them through email and Slack.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Memory Squared has received positive feedback regarding their collaborative approach. Clients highlighted the team&#39;s exceptional project management, responsiveness, and ability to integrate client feedback dynamically. One client noted, &#34;The collaboration with Memory Squared not only resulted in a successful project but also gave us good perspectives regarding further product development.&#34; Another remarked on the team&#39;s commitment to understanding their vision, stating, &#34;They often proposed details that went beyond the original scope, which ultimately turned out to be decisive for the success of the platform.&#34;
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="2051375"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="285143"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1152814"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">UI/UX Design for AI Tools Development Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 26, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Then, we cooperated with Memory Squared on the designs itself. The possibility of seeing real-time changes in Figma helped with the coordination, as we didn’t have to wait for the designers to send us their work – we could always open the tab and see them but also leave our real-time comments concerning the changes. This level of collaboration ensured that our vision was accurately translated into a functional and visually appealing product.
            </p>
          </div>

            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The project was carried out in the timeline defined by our deadlines and by sincere description of the development team’s time abilities. We came to agreement with deadlines of every stage and both sides were consequent in holding onto them. Although on the discovery stage a lot of specification details were not described yet, after the first few workshops we planned the timestamps of the project and, thanks to the team's <b>commitment and agile work on both sides</b>, they became the frames of the decisions we made about products.

        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Lizard Global has received positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature in project management. Clients praised their responsiveness and hands-on approach, stating that the team effectively addressed challenges and swiftly implemented innovative solutions. One client highlighted the company&#39;s structured yet flexible workflow, which allowed for adjustments and improvements throughout the project. Overall, the sentiment is highly favorable, with clients expressing satisfaction in the team&#39;s dedication to meeting their needs and enhancing workflow efficiency.
      </p>
    </div>

With consistently positive reviews, clients praise their structured project management, responsiveness, and attention to detail. No significant negative feedback was noted, underscoring their effective and client-focused approach.

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
              data-gtm_insight_id="753630"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Accommodating
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Guaraná Technologies has received high praise for their accommodating nature, as evidenced by their willingness to find solutions tailored to client needs. One client noted, &#34;They always found solutions to my issues, and they accommodated my needs,&#34; highlighting their responsiveness and accessibility. Additionally, the client appreciated their honesty and lack of overselling, stating, &#34;They were the most honest&#34; among agencies contacted. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong commitment to client satisfaction and flexibility.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="81607"
          data-gtm_insight_id="753630"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Design & Development for Project Management App</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 29, 2019</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They always found solutions to my issues, and <b>they accommodated my needs</b>. They never took shortcuts, and they presented me with options to choose from. I contacted a lot of agencies, but they were the most honest. They never try to oversell to their clients and are <b>very accommodating</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/guaran-technologies/81607"
            title="View Guaraná Technologies Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="24742"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="81607"
            data-gtm_insight_id="753630"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
      </ul>
    </div>

            >Appinventiv is a mobile application development company specializing in iOS and Android platforms. They have received a mix of both positive and negative feedback, with approximately 70% of the reviews praising their technical proficiency, project management, and commitment to quality. However, around 30% of reviews reflect concerns about communication and delivery issues. Many clients commend their problem-solving abilities and adaptability.

            <button

              data-gtm_provider_id="25924"

              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Accommodating
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Appinventiv has consistently demonstrated a high level of accommodation in their client interactions. Clients frequently noted their willingness to work flexible hours, even outside of standard times, to meet project demands. For instance, one client mentioned that Appinventiv staff would adjust their schedules for early morning meetings, showcasing their dedication. Overall, the sentiment reflects an appreciation for their responsiveness and adaptability, with multiple clients expressing satisfaction with their accommodating approach throughout the project lifecycle.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25924"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="45499"
          data-gtm_insight_id="756253"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev & Design Partner for Mobility Product Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 25, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We had an SOW put together and it spelled out a lot of the details including the communications. Because they are offshore, we tried to schedule meetings early in the morning and again, most of us within the organization are in New York, so <b>Appinventiv has been very accommodating</b>. I have regular meetings scheduled with Arvind (Project Manager) a couple of times a week which are at 7:30 a.m. my time, which is in the evening for him and is always after dinner. I have even been on with him when it was 10 or 11 o’clock at night for them going through UAT testing. <b>They are very accommodating</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Open to feedback
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Groovy Technoweb Pvt. Ltd. for their openness to feedback and suggestions throughout the project. One client highlighted their impressive responsiveness, stating that any requested changes were implemented almost instantly. The dedication of the team was noted as exceptional, with constant communication and a willingness to accommodate client input, resulting in high satisfaction with deliverables. Overall, the sentiment regarding their openness to feedback is very positive.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

        >

            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">E-Commerce Development for Tech Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Mar 26, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We communicated via Skype and <b>if we had a suggestion or change the fixes would be done almost instantly</b>, if not within a day or two. We loved their <b>openness to suggestions</b>. We pretty much got 98% of what we asked for and the other 2% probably were a bad idea anyway.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--service-line">

    <ul class="features">
  
  <li class="features__item">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Web App &amp; Mobile App Dev &amp; Design for Neurorehabilitation Co
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  mobitouch has designed and developed a cognitive rehabilitation app for a neurorehabilitation company. The team has built web and mobile UX/UI mock-ups, an admin panel, a prototype, and a compliance
        
        <a
          target="_blank"
          href="/go-to-review/mobitouch/361652"
          title="Read Full Review on mobitouch"
          aria-label="Read Full Review on mobitouch"
          class="provider-insight__highlight-more-link"
          data-link_text="Read More Profile Link"
          data-gtm_provider_id="28030"
          data-gtm_review_id="361652"
          data-gtm_insight_id="2053113"
        >
          Read more
        </a>

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="26124"
              data-gtm_insight_id="756712"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Accommodating
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall sentiment regarding hedgehog lab&#39;s accommodating nature is highly positive. Clients frequently noted their flexibility and responsiveness; for instance, one client praised their ability to adapt to changing project needs and maintain excellent communication. Another emphasized their willingness to collaborate closely as true partners rather than merely service providers. This adaptability, coupled with a proactive approach to problem-solving, has consistently impressed clients, leading to a strong partnership experience.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="26124"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="291771"
          data-gtm_insight_id="756712"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App, Webiste & DXP Platform Dev for Consulting Co</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 30, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The team has been very flexible and <b>accommodated change throughout</b> (which is essential when collaborating with so many partners) so it has been a positive experience. Communication is also excellent; we keep constant contact, and they keep everybody in the loop. They are extremely responsive and a pleasure to work with.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Overall, client feedback emphasizes mReady Apps&#39; strong collaborative approach, highlighted by their responsiveness and effective communication. One client noted their &#39;exceptional communication and interaction skills,&#39; which fostered a seamless working relationship. Another remarked on their &#39;joyful&#39; work ethic and commitment to quality, describing them as &#39;the best at getting to market quickly.&#39; Such sentiments reflect a positive perception of mReady Apps as a collaborative partner in project execution.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="98786"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="301704"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1976410"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Dev & UX/UI Design for Bank</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 19, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              What stood out the most about this company was their exceptional communication and interaction skills, both internally among team members and externally with us as clients. Their <b>friendly and professional approach facilitated a seamless and collaborative working relationship</b>. From this point of view, NO!
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/essensys-mready/301704"
            title="View essensys { mReady Reviews"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding itCraft&#39;s accommodating nature is highly positive. Clients praised their responsiveness and adaptability to evolving project requirements. For instance, one client noted their proactive communication and ability to onboard a new developer promptly following an initial disruption. Another highlighted itCraft&#39;s flexibility in adapting to changes during project execution. Overall, clients consistently emphasized that itCraft&#39;s understanding of their needs and quick responses contributed significantly to a smooth collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>

            </div>

                Collaborative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights RootQuotient&#39;s strong collaborative approach, fostering an open relationship that facilitates communication and feedback. One client noted, &#34;There’s no wall between us,&#34; emphasizing their satisfaction with the reciprocal nature of their partnership. They appreciated the team&#39;s responsiveness and ability to accommodate their needs, stating, &#34;If I have a problem, I can raise it to their executive leadership, and they respond immediately.&#34; Overall, the sentiment is overwhelmingly positive regarding collaboration.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="820484"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="170594"
          data-gtm_insight_id="961594"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Development Outsourcing for Teachers' Retirement Funds Co</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Dec 6, 2022</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We appreciate that they show us mock-ups before building things because we can tweak the design and send it to business users for feedback. We have daily meetings through Microsoft Teams to discuss issues, so any problem we have is only 24 hours old. <b>They’re very open and provide feedback when a piece of hardware isn’t working</b>. We ask questions and poke holes in their work, and <b>they’re very open to that too</b>. Therefore, we have a great reciprocal relationship — <b>there’s no wall between us</b>. If I have a problem, question, or concern, I can raise it to their executive leadership, and they respond immediately. RootQuotient’s biggest strength is their ability to collaborate with us. I’ve worked with other outsourced providers where there was a big wall between us; we couldn’t ask questions or talk to certain people, making it hard for the relationship to work. <b>With RootQuotient, we don’t have this issue at all</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

            target="_blank"

      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients consistently highlight Launchpad App Development&#39;s accommodating nature, noting their flexibility in adapting to changing project scopes and requests. One client praised their willingness to implement design changes without additional fees, reflecting a commitment to collaboration. Another emphasized their quick responsiveness and support throughout the development process, particularly during challenging circumstances. Overall, the sentiment surrounding their accommodating approach is overwhelmingly positive, with clients expressing satisfaction and appreciation for the team&#39;s dedication to meeting their needs.
      </p>

<li class="provider-list-item" id="provider-419426" itemprop="itemListElement" itemscope itemtype="https://schema.org/ListItem">
  

































    







    






    

    

    

    

    



<meta itemprop="position" content="27">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding Exyte&#39;s accommodating nature is highly positive. A client noted their flexibility in scheduling and responsiveness, stating, &#34;They are flexible, professional, and knowledgeable.&#34; Despite a six-hour time difference, communication has been seamless, with prompt replies from the team. The client appreciated Exyte&#39;s willingness to adapt to their pace as a startup, highlighting their accommodating approach throughout the project.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="419426"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="102778"
          data-gtm_insight_id="866374"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Smart Contracts & Platform Dev for Microcar Startup</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jul 23, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              I’m currently acting as the project manager, and have found them to be <b>very flexible and accommodating to our schedule</b>. Yuriy, our local system engineer, and I have a weekly update to check in on project progress, development, and testing results. Even though there is a six-hour time difference between our office in New Zealand and Exyte’s office in Russia, it’s been <b>very easy to contact him</b>.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Client feedback highlights Robosoft Technologies Inc.&#39;s accommodating approach throughout various projects. One client noted their &#39;understanding and very patient&#39; nature, while another emphasized their &#39;responsiveness&#39; and ability to adapt to changing requirements without imposing ideas. The overall sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Robosoft&#39;s willingness to support clients, even in challenging circumstances, reinforcing their reputation as a reliable partner in project execution.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">

          class="provider-insight__review"

          data-gtm_index="0"

          data-gtm_insight_id="772227"

          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Cloud-Based Platform Design & Dev for International NGO</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 1, 2020</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We’ve been thrilled to have Robosoft as a partner. They’ve been <b>understanding and very patient</b>. Their CEO is passionate about supporting nonprofits and investing in early-grade education. All of their team members have been absolutely fantastic to work with as well as professional and solution-oriented. They’ve been a responsive partner as we’ve built up our internal capacity because we’re a fairly undisciplined organization from a technology and software development perspective. The Robosoft team has been <b>attentive to our needs, even with last-minute and urgent matters</b>.
            </p>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"

              data-gtm_provider_id="16032"
              data-gtm_insight_id="697504"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Easy to work with
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Easy to work with
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Brightec has received consistently positive feedback regarding their ease of collaboration. Clients highlight their professional and friendly approach, with one noting that Brightec&#39;s team is &#39;very easy to get along with&#39; and &#39;not corporate in a corporate sense, but professional.&#39; Another client praised their responsive communication, stating they are &#39;absolutely fantastic to work with&#39; and have &#39;never had issues with missed deadlines.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Brightec&#39;s collaborative nature and professionalism.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="16032"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="36450"
          data-gtm_insight_id="697504"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App for Management Consulting Firm </h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 10, 2017</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They’re absolutely fantastic to work with, and we’ve never had issues with missed deadlines. <b>They’re good at advising and designing</b>; they notice things. When we come up with an idea, they’re good at molding the idea and producing the relevant designs to go with it.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/brightec/36450"
            title="View Brightec Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="16032"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="36450"
            data-gtm_insight_id="697504"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="16032"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="62954"
          data-gtm_insight_id="697504"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Marketing App Development for Education Group</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Apr 22, 2016</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Brightec is extremely tech-savvy, but also <b>good at explaining things in a nontechnical way</b>. They were <b>very flexible and easy to work with</b>. We have a very clear idea about what our brand is and how to present it. Brightec understood that and let us lead while advising us on the technical aspects of the apps.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/brightec/62954"
            title="View Brightec Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="16032"
            data-gtm_index="1"
            data-gtm_review_id="62954"
            data-gtm_insight_id="697504"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="16032"
          data-gtm_index="2"
          data-gtm_review_id="36330"
          data-gtm_insight_id="697504"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile Development for British Media Marketplace </h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Oct 7, 2014</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Their developers are good in terms of communication, <b>very visible, very open with the work they do</b>. They used a tool called Basecamp with our project, which is a project management tool, which allowed us to add jobs and they would mark off filters as they went through them. I think over and above anything else they’re a good group of people, <b>very easy to get along with</b>. Brightec’s team is not corporate in a corporate sense, but professional.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"

    <a
      target="_blank"
      href="/profile/brightec#reviews"
      title="View Brightec Reviews"
      class="provider__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link provider-insight__cta-link--reviews-mention sg-button-v2 sg-button-v2--secondary"
      aria-label="View Brightec Reviews"

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have expressed a highly positive sentiment regarding the collaborative nature of Flutter Development AA&#43; | Codigee. One client noted that project management was clear and transparent, with seamless communication and prompt responses, which made collaboration effective. Another client highlighted the team&#39;s ability to quickly address needs and incorporate feedback, demonstrating strong teamwork. Overall, the feedback reflects a strong alignment in values and a commitment to understanding client requirements, fostering a productive partnership.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="1592214"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="291537"
          data-gtm_insight_id="1066078"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">API Development for Retail</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 29, 2024</span>

                Accommodating
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The Distance App Developers have consistently demonstrated an accommodating approach to client needs, as highlighted in multiple reviews. Clients noted their willingness to adapt to complex business models and provide rough estimates for additional features, ensuring flexibility throughout the project lifecycle. One client specifically praised their responsiveness and problem-solving abilities, stating they were &#39;always available&#39; and quick to address issues. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their adaptability and commitment to client satisfaction.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">

            </p>

        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The overall sentiment regarding Stakk&#39;s accommodating nature is overwhelmingly positive. Clients consistently highlight the team&#39;s flexibility and willingness to adapt to changing requirements without additional costs. For instance, one client noted Stakk&#39;s ability to handle numerous revisions within the original scope, emphasizing their adaptability. Another client appreciated the prompt responsiveness and collaborative communication, stating that Stakk was always ready to accommodate their needs. This accommodating approach has significantly enhanced client satisfaction across various projects.
      </p>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Great project management
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised Devsinc for their exceptional project management capabilities. One CEO noted, &#39;They’ve been great from a project management standpoint,&#39; highlighting their effective use of Atlassian Jira and reliable communication via email and Slack. The ease of collaboration and commitment to project success have left clients feeling reassured, with one stating, &#39;You’re in very good hands because Agile17 is a great team.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects strong satisfaction with their project management approach.
      </p>
    </div>

        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        TRIARE, LLC has received positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature across multiple reviews. Clients noted their responsiveness and flexibility, particularly in managing time zone differences and adapting to client needs. One client highlighted how TRIARE, LLC worked outside of standard hours to meet urgent project demands. Another emphasized their consistent communication and ability to address issues promptly, fostering a collaborative environment. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for TRIARE, LLC&#39;s commitment to client satisfaction and adaptability.
      </p>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        BairesDev has received overwhelmingly positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature. Clients praised their adaptability and responsiveness, noting instances such as their ability to adjust to project needs and provide critical counsel during ambiguous phases. One client highlighted BairesDev&#39;s remarkable commitment in navigating undefined project attributes, while another commended their attentive project management and quick responses to requests. Overall, the sentiment indicates a strong appreciation for BairesDev&#39;s willingness to meet diverse client needs effectively.
      </p>
    </div>

<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="22026"
              data-gtm_insight_id="704946"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Collaborative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        The sentiment regarding collaboration with Binary Studio is overwhelmingly positive. Clients have noted the seamless integration of Binary Studio&#39;s team into their own, exemplified by daily stand-ups and consistent communication via Slack and video calls. One client highlighted their willingness to take initiative and adapt to changing project scopes, stating, &#39;They feel like an in-house team.&#39; Another remarked on the effective collaboration, noting, &#39;We were able to treat them more like collaborators than a bunch of contracted code monkeys.&#39;
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="22026"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="113668"
          data-gtm_insight_id="704946"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Backend & Frontend Dev for Event Ticketing Platform</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 23, 2018</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We have them on Slack, so if there are any urgent issues we pop them a message and they’ll start working. We have daily stand-ups with them and <b>there’s a lot of collaboration, so they feel like an in-house team</b>. Every other day we video chat with them to catch up on where they are and what they’re doing. We have a lot of collaboration with them, so we didn’t just hand them a spec and then get a delivery six months later.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/binary-studio/113668"
            title="View Binary Studio Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="22026"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="113668"
            data-gtm_insight_id="704946"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="22026"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="35132"
          data-gtm_insight_id="704946"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Custom Development for Information Technology Solutions Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">4.5</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 90%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Aug 20, 2014</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              We were able to treat them more like <b>collaborators than a bunch of contracted code monkeys</b>. I think that’s pretty unique. They were certainly more than capable of working independently, and making intelligent decisions about how to handle obstacles and setbacks.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/binary-studio/35132"

          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="22026"
          data-gtm_index="2"
          data-gtm_review_id="343210"
          data-gtm_insight_id="704946"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Lending Platform & Mobile App Dev for FinTech Firm</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Jan 15, 2025</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              Binary Studio has been a trusted partner for almost five years, consistently providing skilled software engineers who have become an integral part of our team. While Binary did not have direct input on project management, their contributions have been exceptional: <b>The developers provided by Binary were treated as part of our internal team. They worked seamlessly with our processes, tools, and workflows, collaborating effectively with our staff.</b> Binary demonstrated a deep understanding of our business requirements and consistently delivered developers tailored to meet those needs. Their ability to align with our evolving priorities ensured a smooth and productive collaboration.
            </p>
          </div>

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--service-line">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">

    <ul class="features">
  
  <li class="features__item">

    4 new reviews for Mobile App Development in past 6 months

  <li class="features__item">
    $50,000 – $199,999 avg. project cost
  </li>

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <p class="provider-insight__subtitle">
        Mobile App Development PROJECT HIGHLIGHT
      </p>
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Mobile App Redesign for Education Nonprofit
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        <span class="provider-insight-highlight-rating">5.0</span>
        —  MeguMethod was hired by an education nonprofit to redesign their mobile app. The team refined the app's design and refactored the code to improve its sustainability and scalability.

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Kindgeek has received consistently positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature. Clients highlighted their responsiveness and adaptability to changing project needs, with one stating, &#34;They are attentive to our requirements and actively sought feedback.&#34; Another client praised their seamless integration into teams, noting that Kindgeek&#39;s staff felt like part of their internal team. This flexibility and commitment to addressing client needs significantly contributed to project success, demonstrating a strong alignment with client objectives.
      </p>
    </div>
