<div class="provider__insights provider__insights--v2 sg-show-more-less__item-to-hide">
    <div class="sg-tabs-expanded">
        
        <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__list">
            
            
            
            
            
                
                
                
            
            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="25452"
              data-gtm_insight_id="755299"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Accommodating
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        HyperSense Software Inc has received consistently positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature. Clients highlighted their responsiveness, noting that the team was always available for questions and quick to adjust to changing requirements. One client emphasized that HyperSense met all deadlines and effectively addressed concerns, showcasing their flexibility. Another remarked on their proactive communication, ensuring clarity even during project shifts, which significantly enhanced the overall experience. This strong sentiment reflects a commitment to client satisfaction and adaptability.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="25452"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="287741"
          data-gtm_insight_id="755299"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">UI/UX Design & Web Dev for Wireless Medical Device Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">May 9, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              The HyperSense team was always available by email for any questions and responded within 24 hours. Timelines were established from the first meeting and they met unless we needed changes and <b>the team was extremely accommodating</b>. The most impressive thing about working with HyperSense is the ability of their team to listen to what I needed.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/hypersense-software/287741"
            title="View HyperSense Software Inc Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="25452"
            data-gtm_index="0"

            <button
              class="sg-tabs-expanded__tab sg-tabs-expanded__tab--reviews-mention "
              type="button"
              data-insight="reviews-mention"
              data-gtm_provider_id="41916"
              data-gtm_insight_id="2035076"
              aria-label="Show company reviews"
            >
                Collaborative
            </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Collaborative
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Clients have consistently praised WEZOM for their collaborative approach and effective communication. One client highlighted that WEZOM&#39;s &#39;shared commitment to client success and proactive communication&#39; made them ideal partners. Another noted their &#39;exceptional project management skills,&#39; consistently meeting deadlines and addressing needs. Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for WEZOM&#39;s ability to foster a collaborative environment that contributes significantly to project success.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="41916"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="334392"
          data-gtm_insight_id="2035076"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for UI/UX Design Company</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Nov 28, 2024</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              WEZOM’s technical capabilities created a seamless experience where form and function worked together harmoniously. The <b>collaboration didn’t just result in a functional app but a product that felt innovative, user-focused, and aligned with business objectives</b>. Their <b>shared commitment to client success and proactive communication</b> made them stand out as ideal partners.
            </p>
          </div>

          
          <a
            target="_blank"
            href="/go-to-review/wezom/334392"
            title="View WEZOM Reviews"
            class="provider-insight__review-show-full-review"
            aria-label="Read Full Review"
            data-gtm_provider_id="41916"
            data-gtm_index="0"
            data-gtm_review_id="334392"
            data-gtm_insight_id="2035076"
          >
            Read Full Review
          </a>
        </li>
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="41916"
          data-gtm_index="1"
          data-gtm_review_id="338106"
          data-gtm_insight_id="2035076"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">

<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">

    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Andersen Inc. has received positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature across various projects. Clients noted their willingness to adapt to unforeseen changes, as one remarked on Andersen&#39;s team being &#39;very accommodating of unforeseen changes or requirements.&#39; Another client praised their account managers for effectively accommodating needs and adjusting contracts. Overall, sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for Andersen&#39;s flexibility and proactive engagement, contributing to successful project outcomes.
      </p>
    </div>

Another review emphasized consistent communication and a commitment to finding effective solutions, stating, &#39;On time, always listening and finding good solutions.&#39; Overall, the sentiment around their flexibility is highly favorable, suggesting they are responsive and accommodating to client requirements.
      </p>

One reviewer highlighted their responsiveness and commitment to meeting deadlines, stating, &#34;Chelsea Apps were great at project management, accommodating, thorough...&#34; Another noted that 3 SIDED CUBE challenged them to consider alternative solutions, reflecting a collaborative approach.             </button>

            

            
                




<section class="sg-tabs-expanded__section sg-tabs-expanded__section--reviews-mention provider-insight">
  <div class="sg-tabs-expanded__section-content">
    <div class="provider-insight__summary">
      <h4 class="provider-insight__title">
        Reviews mention Accommodating
      </h4>
      <p class="provider-insight__description">
        Atta Systems has received consistently positive feedback regarding their accommodating nature. Clients have highlighted their flexibility in adapting to changing project specifications, with one stating they are &#39;more like partners than an external developer.&#39; Another client noted their commitment to understanding requirements, stating, &#39;no matter what it takes, they’re willing to accommodate.&#39; Overall, the sentiment reflects a strong appreciation for their responsiveness and willingness to adjust to client needs.
      </p>
    </div>
    <div class="provider-insight__review-snippets-container">
      <ul id="insights-review-snippets" class="provider-insight__scrollbar-list sg-scrollbar sg-scrollbar--dark">
        
        <li
          class="provider-insight__review"
          data-gtm_provider_id="771528"
          data-gtm_index="0"
          data-gtm_review_id="64300"
          data-gtm_insight_id="955104"
        >
          <div class="provider-insight__review-body">
            <h5 class="provider-insight__review-title">Mobile App Development for Startup Builder</h5>
            <div class="provider-insight__review-details sg-rating">
              <span class="sg-rating__number">5.0</span>
              <span class="sg-rating__stars" style="--sgStarsRating: 100%;"></span>
              <span class="provider-insight__review-date">Feb 10, 2021</span>
            </div>
            <p class="provider-insight__review-snippet">
              They’re more like partners than an external developer. Our specifications have changed throughout the project and they’ve been <b>accommodating</b>. Additionally, they offer competitive rates.
            </p>

        <div class="lm-only-related-block">
    <div id="lm-methodology-accordion" class="lm-only-related-block lm-methodology sg-accordion sg-accordion-large sg-accordion-bordered sg-accordion-contrast">
        <button
            type="button"
            aria-label="Portfolio & Awards"
            class="sg-accordion__title-wrapper sg-secondary-title sg-secondary-title--icon-plus"
            data-dom__data-accordion-status="open"
        >
            <span class="container sg-accordion__title sg-secondary-title__text">
                How the Leaders Matrix Works
            </span>
        </button>

        <div class="container sg-accordion__contents">
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-1">
                <p class="lm-methodology__text">
                    A Clutch Leaders Matrix provides a broad view of the top-performing companies in a particular service or
                    location. Each company featured in a Leaders Matrix is evaluated based on Focus and Ability to Deliver.
                    The size of each circle indicates that company’s size.

                    <a
                        target="_blank"
                        href="https://clutch.co/methodology"
                        title="Learn More about Leaders Matrix Methodology"
                        class="lm-methodology__link"
                        aria-label="Click LM Methodology Learn More"
                        data-gtm_event_category="click_lm_methodology_learn_more"
                    >
                        Learn More
                    </a>
                </p>
            </div>
            <div class="lm-methodology__column-2">
                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Focus</b> (x-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Focus accounts for a company’s specialization within a certain service.</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__heading-small"><b>Ability to Deliver</b> (y-axis)</p>

                <p class="lm-methodology__text">Ability to Deliver considers three criteria:</p>

                <ol class="lm-methodology__list">
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Client feedback and reviews</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Work experience and previous projects</li>
                    <li class="lm-methodology__list-item">Market presence and reputation in the industry</li>
                </ol>
            </div>
        </div>
    </div>
</div>

    </div>
